Episodes.Title: Shatter
Episodes.Actors: Harold Perrineau, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Eion Bailey
Episodes.Plot: Boyd feels the town slipping away from him as the weather grows colder and the residents more desperate.

Episodes.Title: When We Go
Episodes.Plot: Boyd struggles to find a path forward as the town says farewell to one of their own. Fatima's health takes a turn for the worse, while Tabitha finds help from an unlikely ally.

Episodes.Title: Mouse Trap
Episodes.Actors: Harold Perrineau, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Eion Bailey
Episodes.Plot: Kenny leads a group into the forest in search of food as Donna and Ellis try to talk Boyd out of a dangerous plan. Meanwhile, Tabitha makes a mind-bending discovery.

Episodes.Title: There and Back Again
Episodes.Actors: Harold Perrineau, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Eion Bailey
Episodes.Plot: Boyd is forced to make a tough decision when newcomers arrive in town at nightfall; Victor unearths memories from the past in the hopes of finding answers.

Episodes.Title: The Light of Day
Episodes.Actors: Harold Perrineau, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Eion Bailey
Episodes.Plot: Victor must face a painful reminder of his past; Julie looks for ways to cope with her trauma; Boyd struggles to keep the town safe as the residents begin to question his judgment; Tabitha tries to adjust to her new surroundings.

Episodes.Title: These Fragile Lives
Episodes.Actors: Harold Perrineau, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Eion Bailey
Episodes.Plot: The edges begin to fray as concerns about Fatima's pregnancy deepen; Jade follows a clue trail into the forest; Julie and Randall seek a bit of normalcy.

Episodes.Title: Tresholds
Episodes.Plot: Accusations start flying and truths come to light in the aftermath of a tragedy; Victor struggles to recover long-buried memories about the town's past; Julie and Ethan search for answers about the mysterious ruins in the woods.
